00014 // DocumentStructureHolderNode
00015 //
00016 // 18 June 2005 -- pto
00017 //
00018 // This node stores the document structure for the current document
00019 // to be shared among shrinkage belief nodes or other nodes that 
00020 // may need to use the document structure for retrieval.
00021 //
00022
